title: Grey & White Colorblock Linen Shirt Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's shirt dress in grey and white colorblock design, isolated on plain white background, high-detail linen texture, visible stitching, front button placket, short cuffed sleeves, pointed collar, mid-thigh length, subtle curved hem, no model, no mannequin, no human, apparel-only
trims_and_details: front button placket with matte white buttons
techpack: Grey and white colorblock shirt dress in 100% linen. Straight silhouette with relaxed fit. Short cuffed sleeves, pointed collar, front button placket with matte white buttons. Mid-thigh length with curved hemline. Contrast stitching along colorblock seam for definition.
provenance: Designed from combination of grey and white color trend, inspired by commercial-ready minimal colorblock apparel.
design_text:
Grey & White Colorblock Linen Shirt Dress (GW-001)
Colors: cool grey, optic white
Fabrics: 100% linen
Prints/Patterns: colorblock
Garment Type: shirt dress
Silhouette: straight
Sleeves: short cuffed sleeves
Neckline: pointed collar
Length: mid-thigh
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: front button placket with matte white buttons, curved hemline, contrast stitching along colorblock seam
Techpack: available
